title: Trading Odell Beckham Jr., Understanding the Trade Market in the Modern NFL, and an Important Rule Addition | The Ringer NFL Show (Ep. 250)
description:
The Ringer's Kevin Clark and Danny Kelly discuss the big rule changes coming out of the league meeting (02:00), Odell Beckham Jr. trade rumors (16:00), and which current players are worth more than two first-round draft picks (30:00).

You can find the official Ringer merch store here: http://bit.ly/ringershop


      
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
